maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/9.orig:
\i[arrow-n] Bergen Village
\i[arrow-se] Base of the Mountain 
\i[arrow-sw] Off Road
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/9.text:
\i[arrow-n] \v[area.bergen.name]
\i[arrow-se] Pied de la montagne
\i[arrow-sw] Hors Sentier

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Hermits House
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Maison de l'Ermite

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Of course I got guard duty on Bergen Trail...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bien sûr, il a fallu que je sois de garde sur le \v[area.bergen-trails.name]...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Oh, a small house in the middle of nowhere. Isn't that nice?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oh, une maison en plein milieu de nulle part. Si c'est pas chouette ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Game Tester
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Testeur de Jeu

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Oh now look who it is!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oh, regarde qui est là !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Hi!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Salut !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Could not imagine a better person to show up right now, too.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Je ne pouvais pas m'attendre à tomber sur quelqu'un de mieux !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Oh, hehe. Looks like you already know what I'm going to ask?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oh, héhé. Tu sais déjà ce que je vais te demander ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Well... \. That makes things easy then!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bon...\. Ça va rendre les choses plus simples alors !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: I got a new job testing parkours, but this time it needs to be done within a time limit.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: J'ai une nouvelle tâche pour tester des parkours, mais cette fois, avec une limite de temps.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Sounds pretty dope, right? But also like... \. lots of work, and I might start sweating even.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Ça a l'air cool, non ? Mais c'est aussi...\. Beaucoup de boulot, et du genre à mouiller sa chemise.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Who would have thought this job could be so hard?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Qui pouvait avoir pensé que ce job serait si difficile ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: You'd imagine that running around as an avatar wouldn't really exhaust you.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Et on entend partout que courir en tant qu'avatar ne devrait pas être fatiguant...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Anyway, what do you say? Wanna help me do this?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Peu importe, qu'est-ce que tu en dis ? Est-ce que tu veux m'aider là-dessus ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Sweet potatoes!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Chouette !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Alright, let's see...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bon, voyons voir...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Okay, there we go. Just walk through this point like last time.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Voilà, on peut y aller. Marche sur ce point, comme la dernière fois.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: The timer will start automatically and you'll have to finish before it runs out.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Le minuteur va démarrer automatiquement et il faut finir avant qu'il expire.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Pretty simple stuff, really. I'm sure you can handle it!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: C'est vraiment simple. Je suis sûr que tu peux y arriver !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Oh man, what a bummer.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oh non, et je m'y attendais pas...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Come back if you change your mind...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Reviens, si jamais tu changes d'avis...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: ... I'll just wait here.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: ... Je vais juste attendre ici.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Just go to the start marker on the left. Time will start automatically.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Va juste sur le marqueur de départ à gauche. Le temps démarrera automatiquement.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: But don't leave or it'll reset. Really annoying, I know.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Mais ne pars pas d'ici, sinon il sera remis à zéro. C'est énervant, je sais.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: What are you doing? You only have \v[timers.roundBergenTimer.formatRemainingTime] left.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Qu'est-ce que tu fais ? Il ne te reste que \v[timers.roundBergenTimer.formatRemainingTime] !
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.note: formatRemainingTime uses hh:mm:ss, which is hardcoded in a lot of places already

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Wow, that looked so taxing. But you pulled through.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Waouh, ça avait l'air d'être fatiguant. Mais tu as quand même réussi.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: And you didn't even break a sweat. Do you work out or something?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Et tu n'as même pas transpiré. Tu fais du sport ou quoi ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: And nothing weird happened, right? No sudden strokes or anything?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Et rien d'anormal ne s'est produit, non ? Pas de chocs soudains ou autre ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: My boss will be thrilled!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Mon chef va être content !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Thanks so much... \. again! You really nail these tracks.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Merci beaucoup...\. encore ! Tu assures vraiment à ces courses d'obstacles.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: We make a great team, don't you think?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: On est une bonne équipe, tu trouves pas ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Okay, right. I'll go do my report now. Until next time!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Héhé. Bon je vais aller faire mon rapport maintenant. À la prochaine !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Bye.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bye.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Alright, let's go!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Allez, on reprend !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Oh boy, you did it!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oh ouais, tu as réussi !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Aw bummer... You can try again by going back to the first marker though!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Ah dommage... C'est pas grave, tu peux recommencer au premier marqueur !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: What the heck is up with these hedgehags?!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: C'est quoi le problème avec ces \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Did you see their level?\. Better not attack them...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Tu as vu leurs niveaux ?\. Faudrait mieux ne pas les attaquer...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: How?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Comment ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Hey! Thanks for taking care of those.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Hé ! Merci pour t'être occupé d'eux.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Lea!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Lea !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: How in the world did a bunch of high-level Hedgehags even end up in this place?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Comment est-ce que des \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s de haut niveau ont pu atterrir ici ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: From what I saw there was this small, black-haired guy that was chased around by them.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: De ce que j'ai vu, il y avait ce petit mec avec des cheveux noirs qui se faisait poursuivre par eux.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: They probably lost track of him and then just stuck around.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Ils l'ont probablement perdu de vue et ils sont restés là.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: I guess...\. Anyway, we gotta go!\. Bye!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: C'est ce que je pense...\. Bon, faut que j'y aille !\. Bye !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: ...Why?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Lily
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Lily

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Priel
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Priel

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Hi...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Salut...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Hey, Lea!\. How is it going?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Hé, Lea !\. Comment ça va ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Let me guess, he's not there?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Laisse-moi deviner, il n'est pas là ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [shakes head]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Oh dear.\. Let me try to contact him again.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oh non.\. Laisse-moi essayer de le recontacter.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Adding person\s[7]......
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Ajout d'une personne\s[7]......

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Reize
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Reize

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Ohhh...\. hey!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Ohhh...\. Hé !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Hi...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Salut...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Dude, we told you to wait!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Mec, on t'a dit d'attendre !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Yeah...\. you see, I was chased by a bunch of Hedgehags that wouldn't leave me alone.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oui...\. Mais tu vois, j'étais pourchassé par une bande de \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s qui ne voulaient pas me laisser tranquille.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Wait...\. they chased you this high up to Bergen Trail?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Attends...\. Ils t'ont poursuivi jusqu'ici sur le \v[area.bergen-trails.name] ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: How?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Comment ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: I...\. tried to feed them, but then they got angry...\. somehow?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: J'ai...\. essayé de leur donner à manger, mais ils sont devenus agressifs...\. Je ne sais pas pourquoi...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: You're not supposed to feed them.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Tu n'es pas censé leur donner à manger.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Well, Ivo wanted me to try something...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bah, Ivo voulait que j'essaie quelque chose...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Ugh...\. Figures.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Rah...\. On se demande bien pourquoi.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Anyways!\. It seems I got rid of them!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Peu importe !\. On dirait que je m'en suis débarrassé !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: So where are you right now?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Donc où est-ce que tu es maintenant ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: I actually found that Bergen town!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: J'ai trouvé cette ville de Bergen !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: But I had to keep going and now I'm in this desert.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Mais il fallait que je continue et maintenant je suis dans ce désert.

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Why won't you just STOP MOVING?!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu T'ARRÊTERAIS PAS DE BOUGER ENFIN ?!

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: I thought you escaped those hedgehags?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Je pensais que tu avais semé ces harissons ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Yeah...\. but not the penguins!\. They're still after me!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Oui...\. mais pas les pingouins !\. Ils sont toujours après moi !
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.note: assuming that reize is an idiot (oh rly) and don't know the differencec between 'manchot' and 'pingouins'

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: And they're fast!\. I gotta go!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Et c'est qu'ils sont rapides !\. Faut que j'y aille !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: WHERE ARE YOU?!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: T'ES OÙ ?!

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: I dunno!!\. Oh wait...\. there is this \c[3]huge pink tree\c[0] closeby!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Je sais pas !!\. Oh attends...\. il y a cet \c[3]arbre violet géant\c[0] pas loin !

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Bye!!
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bye !!

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Lily
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Lily

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Priel
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Priel

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Ugh...
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Eh...

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Well, maybe you can help him with his little...\. Penguin problem?
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Bon, peut-être que tu peux l'aider avec son petit...\. problème de pingouins ?

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.orig: Let's hope he will be there this time at least.
maps/bergen-trail/path-5.json/entities/5.text: Espérons qu'il soit là cette fois.
